title: KHR_audio_graph Audio Data
description: Audio data objects define where audio data is located and what format the data is in. The data is either accessed via a bufferView or uri.

bufferView.description: The index of the buffer view that contains the audio data. The buffer represents an audio asset residing in memory, created from decoding an audio file, or from raw data.

numberOfChannels.description: The number of channels for a buffer view for a raw data.

length.description: The length of each channel in buffer view for a raw data.

sampleRate.description: The sample-rate, in Hz, for a raw data.

duration.description: Duration of the PCM audio data in seconds for a raw data.

mimeType.description: The audio's MIME type. Required if buffer view is defined.

uri.description: The uri of the audio file. Relative paths are relative to the .gltf file.
